about_the_game:
Hero Clicker

Hero clicker is a mix between a clicker game and a rogue-like.

Items and relics

There will be over 50+ items and 20+ relics.
Items are received by events or buying them while relics can only be received by killing elites.

Not just clicking to deal damage!

You'll be able to go various builds ranging from; auto clickers, lifesteal, thorns, skills etc.

Mercenaries to recruit

You'll be able to recruit mercenaries which act as auto clickers.

Buff and debuff stack system

The buffs work in a system I call the "Stack system" which means you have to be interactive to make use of most buffs or debuffs.
Such as bleed, the more stacks you have clicked before bleed hits 0 the more damage you will do.
Poison will deal more damage the more stacks you add to it.
BUT!
Also enemies can debuff you such as bind which makes your clicks deal no damage until you clicked the stacks away.
Skillblock which blocks your skill until you clicked the stacks away.
The game will challange you in many ways!

Each hero has their own abilities

Each hero features their own playstyle, they will each have 4 skills unlocked by leveling.
Each skill can be upgraded with the final upgrade changing the skill completely.
  • Thief-
    Thief has a higher base damage but lower health.
    Thief gains increased gold when killing an enemy.

  • Paladin-
    Paladin starts with a lower base damage but higher health.
    Paladin regains some health when killing an enemy.

  • Mage-
    Mage features a higher base damage but lower health.
    Mage regains some mana when killing an enemy.

    More characters to come-
